scripts.build: pnpm run build:api && pnpm run build:ui
scripts.build:ui: cd apps/geodude && rm -rf dist .vite && npm run build
scripts.cf:publish: pnpm run cf:publish:api && pnpm run cf:publish:ui
scripts.cf:publish:ui: cd apps/geodude && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/geodude-api && wrangler d1 execute optiview_db --remote --file=./migrations/0001_initial_ai_visibility.sql
scripts.db:migrate:class: cd apps/geodude-api && wrangler d1 execute optiview_db --remote --file=./migrations/d1/039_add_class_sampled_columns.sql
